overview: Socialite Anatol Spencer, finding his relationship with his wife lackluster, goes in search of excitement. After bumping into old flame Emilie, he lets an apartment for her only to find that she cheats on him. He is subsequently robbed, conned, and booted from pillar to post. He decides to return to his wife and discovers her carousing with his best friend Max.
tagline: He couldn't resist a pretty face, and every day he fell into a new adventure. Thus he followed the lure of romance until-?
title: The Affairs of Anatol
